card.name: MaGog
card.property: Forced Response: After MaGog attacks and damages a character, place 1 ratings counter on The Champion. Forced Interrupt: When MaGog would be defeated, reset his hit points to 10[per_hero] instead. Place 3[per_hero] ratings counters on The Challengers and deal each player 1 facedown encounter card.

alternate.name: MaGog
alternate.property: Forced Response: After MaGog attacks and damages a character, place 2 ratings counters on The Champion. Forced Interrupt: When MaGog would be defeated, reset his hit points to 10[per_hero] instead. Place 2[per_hero] ratings counters on The Challengers and deal each player 1 facedown encounter card.

card.name: Melee in the Mojo-seum
card.property: Contents: MaGog (A) (MaGog (B) instead for expert mode). MaGog and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (1 random modular set from the MojoMania scenario pack). Setup: Put The Champion environment card and The Challengers environment card into play, each with its [[BOOING CROWD]] side faceup.

alternate.name: Melee in the Mojo-seum
alternate.property: The players cannot win the game unless they wow the crowd as The Challengers. [star] Forced Interrupt: When this scheme would be completed, place 2[per_hero] ratings counters on The Champion and remove all threat from here instead.
Teleported into a bizarre arena, you must fight for the audience's entertainment...and your lives!

card.name: The Champion
card.property: If there are at least 5[per_hero] ratings counters here, flip this environment (without removing ratings counters).
"In this corner, we have your ninety-nine time defending Mojoverse champion, the mighty MaGog!"

alternate.name: The Champion
alternate.property: Underdogs — Forced Response: After The Champion flips to this side, each player draws 1 card. If there are at least 10[per_hero] ratings counters here, MaGog wins again and the players lose the game.

card.name: The Challengers
card.property: If there are at least 5[per_hero] ratings counters here, flip this environment (without removing ratings counters). (The players wow the crowd by placing ratings counters here.)
"And in this corner, hailing from the tiny, insignificant planet of Earth, we have our challengers!" — Mojo

alternate.name: The Challengers
alternate.property: Tag Team — Forced Response: After The Challengers flips to this side, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Surprise Contender and put it into play engaged with the first player. If it is already in play, give it a tough status card. If there are at least 10[per_hero] ratings counters here, you wow the crowd and the players win the game.

card.name: Jolt of Adrenaline
card.property: Attach to MaGog.nMaGog gains retaliate 1 and stalwart.

card.name: Surge of Aggression
card.property: Attach to MaGog.

card.name: Surprise Contender
card.property: Villainous.

card.name: Spiral
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Spiral would attack, she schemes instead. Spiral cannot take damage or be stunned. Threat cannot be removed from the main scheme.

alternate.name: Spiral
alternate.property: Forced Response: After Spiral activates, place 1 teleport counter here. Forced Response: After Spiral activates, place 1 teleport counter here. If there are at least 3[per_hero] teleport counters here, remove all of them and flip Spiral.

card.name: Spiral
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Spiral would attack, she schemes instead. Spiral cannot take damage or be stunned. Threat cannot be removed from the main scheme.

alternate.name: Spiral
alternate.property: Forced Response: After Spiral activates, place 1 teleport counter here. Forced Response: After Spiral activates, place 1 teleport counter here. If there are at least 2[per_hero] teleport counters here, remove all of them and flip Spiral.

card.name: Spiral
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Spiral would attack, she schemes instead. Spiral cannot take damage or be stunned. Threat cannot be removed from the main scheme.

alternate.name: Spiral
alternate.property: Forced Response: After Spiral activates, place 1 teleport counter here. Forced Response: After Spiral activates, place 1 teleport counter here. If there are at least 3[per_hero] teleport counters here, remove all of them and flip Spiral. When Revealed: Spiral attacks each player in player order (even in alter-ego form).

card.name: Across the Mojoverse
card.property: Contents: Spiral (I) and Spiral (II) (Spiral (II) and Spiral (III) instead for expert mode). Spiral and Standard encounter sets. Three modular encounter sets from the MojoMania scenario pack. Setup: Put The Search for Spiral side scheme and 1 random [[SHOW]] environment into play. Shuffle each other [[SHOW]] environment together with the Cornered! treachery to create the show deck. (See rulebook p. 11). Flip Spiral to her [[ESCAPED]] side.

alternate.name: Across the Mojoverse
alternate.property: Forced Interrupt: When a [[SHOW]] environment would be discarded, place it on the bottom of the show deck instead. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
If you want to return home, you'll need the help of the teleporting sorceress, Spiral. But she will need some convincing.

card.name: The Search for Spiral
card.property: Permanent.

card.name: Spiral's Swords
card.property: Attach to Spiral. Uses (3 sword counters).

card.name: Erratic Teleportation
card.property: Surge.

card.name: Mojo
card.property: Forced Response (Hero): After your turn ends, discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Place 1 threat on your hero for each card discarded this way that does not belong to the Mojo encounter set.

card.name: Mojo
card.property: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each friendly character. Forced Response (Hero): After your turn ends, discard the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. Place 1 threat on your hero for each card discarded this way that does not belong to the Mojo encounter set.

card.name: Mojo
card.property: When Revealed: Place 3 threat on each friendly character. Forced Response (Hero): After your turn ends, discard the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. Place 1 threat on your hero for each card discarded this way that does not belong to the Mojo encounter set.

card.name: MojoMania
card.property: Contents: Mojo (I) and Mojo (II) (Mojo (II) and Mojo (III) instead for expert mode). Mojo and Standard encounter sets. Setup: Choose 1 modular set, plus 1[per_hero] additional modular sets, from the MojoMania scenario pack and set them aside. Put the Wheel of Genres environment into play, [[SPINNING]] side faceup.

alternate.name: MojoMania
alternate.property: When Revealed: Choose 1 set-aside encounter set at random, reveal its [[SHOW]] environment and shuffle its remaining cards into the encounter deck. Forced Interrupt: When a character flips or leaves play, move all threat from that character to this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Wheel of Genres
card.property: Forced Response: After the encounter deck resets, if there are no set-aside modular encounter sets remaining, the players lose the game. Otherwise, flip this card.
"The ratings are stagnating. Time to shake things up with a crossover episode!" — Mojo

alternate.name: Wheel of Genres
alternate.property: Forced Interrupt: At the start of step three of the villain phase (deal encounter cards), randomly choose 1 set-aside modular set and reveal its [[SHOW]] environment. Shuffle the rest of that modular set and place it on top of the encounter deck. Deal the first player 2 facedown encounter cards and flip this card.

card.name: Major Domo
card.property: Attach to Mojo.

card.name: Stinger Tail
card.property: Attach to Mojo. Mojo gains retaliate 2.

card.name: Paparazzi
card.property: Hinder 10.

card.name: Undercover Mojo
card.property: Hinder 2[per_hero].

card.name: Dial M for Mojo
card.property: Each other encounter card gains incite 1. Each friendly character gets +1 THW.

card.name: Crime Scene Investigation
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero].

card.name: Law & Order
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero].

card.name: Dragnet
card.property: Hinder 1[per_hero].

card.name: Dragon
card.property: Retaliate 1. Toughness.

card.name: Goblin
card.property: Surge.

card.name: Troll
card.property: Toughness.

card.name: Fetch Quest
card.property: Surge.

card.name: The Mojo Files
card.property: Each minion gains quickstrike.

card.name: Bandolier of Stakes
card.property: Surge. Uses (3 stake counters).

card.name: Mojo Runner
card.property: Each minion and ally gains toughness.

card.name: Magneto 2.6
card.property: Villainous.

card.name: ICE-Teroid M
card.property: Each minion gains guard and patrol.

card.name: Mojo in the Middle
card.property: Each obligation gains 1 acceleration icon ([acceleration]).

card.name: Watch Me Play
card.property: Incite 3. Peril.

card.name: Gunslinger
card.property: Quickstrike.
